question.text: You are invited to a pub lunch. You know that you will have to drive in the evening. What is your best course of action?

explanation.text: Alcohol will stay in the body for several hours and may make you unfit to drive later in the day. Drinking during the day will also affect your performance at work or study.

answer.text: Not drink any alcohol at all
Have some milk before drinking alcohol
Eat a hot meal with your alcoholic drinks
